TopicTitle: Tier One Space Center CONFIRMED: It's a barn!

Articles.Content:
There's RV's, wind turbines, sandbag bunkers and a Space Telescope! And the VAB?

It's a barn. Eyup.

Sorry, no pics, the SQUADCAST showed it just a few moments ago. Did anyone get any captures? I got the album, nevermind.

EDIT:

Here we are!

Javascript is disabled. View full album

HAH! I got this thread in a whole TWO MINUTES before SQUAD got theirs!

Edited November 8, 2014 by Starwhip
Cool! But what are the silos for? Rocket fuel?
That's hilarious! I like where this is going...I wonder what limitations it has..part count? or is it based on size.
This is both unbelievable and awesome! Mk3 parts are next up for the preview. This game just keeps getting better.

Now we can actually barnstorm things... *rimshot*

...*awkward chuckle*...

I'll go back to my corner now.

I wonder if you trash your amazing 100 million funds upgraded building, if you can just not repair it and go back to the barn.

Also, if the tracking station can be upgraded, I wonder how that would work exactly, could you not track asteroids until you got a better one, or would there be something else?

I wonder if you trash your amazing 100 million funds upgraded building, if you can just not repair it and go back to the barn.

Also, if the tracking station can be upgraded, I wonder how that would work exactly, could you not track asteroids until you got a better one, or would there be something else?

You can, actually. If you break a Tier 3 you can buy back the Tier 1 until you've got enough funds to re-upgrade. It was announced in the SquadCast.

Seriously?

I'm speechless.

You can, actually. If you break a Tier 3 you can buy back the Tier 1 until you've got enough funds to re-upgrade. It was announced in the SquadCast.

Ah, I wasn't watching. I was too busy messing with spaceplanes.

Thanks! (also, Jeb seems scared... Do I win the game?)

I should probably wrap up my career save, i'm probably gonna restart when the new update rolls out (Which, from the devnotes, seems like it's going to be soon!)

Good lord. This is... beautiful. Tears were shed... OK, not really.

But still, amazing. SUGGESTION: Add a sewer next to the admin trailer! That way we know what the pool actually is!
Are there more than 3 tiers?

Are there more than 3 tiers?

Maxmaps said that it varies from 3-5 tiers, depending on the building. I don't know which ones have which tiers, though, it was not stated.

KSP is going to be not just an awesome sim, but an awesome game when it's finished. This is amazing.

I love it.

Will be more awsome when they change to Unity 5 so that we don`t lag to death with physics when having fun with big stuff

Besides, career gets kinda tiresom after doing it a dozen times and it`s the same repeative stuff.
I love it! The team did an awesome job basing the buildings on "Kerbal lifestyle".
Hmmm... a trailer park... a barn... bags of sand blocking paths... tracking station looks like it is a few pieces of sheet metal bolted together... Why aren't these things final tier?
I love it all!

Hmmm... a trailer park... a barn... bags of sand blocking paths... tracking station looks like it is a few pieces of sheet metal bolted together... Why aren't these things final tier?

Someone needs to make a plugin that reverses the tiers... If it's possible, I know about as much of C# as I do of the inner workings of Alpha Centuri.

*scratches head*

Okay fine now I have to build a Kerbal General Lee.

I swear I thought this thread was a modder having some fun, obviously I'm not in the loop as usual
So much yes. Am I the only one that hopes we might get a few barn burner parts as well?
hmm? how about farm?

I swear I thought this thread was a modder having some fun

I had hopes such was the case.

Spend day off work attempting to replicate the T-38s and WB-57s often seen in this area.

Check forum to find... a trailer park and barn.

...as someone who likes high-end space centers, I don't approve of this feature.

http://i.imgur.com/irYvt7r.png

(also, Jeb seems scared... Do I win the game?)

It isn't that hard to scare Jeb, actually. Just destroy a part and you're good to go.

I'm not really feeling the art for the buildings. I like the idea of upgradeability, but I was expecting it to be more of a size scale rather than a complete art style change. At the moment this looks like a modder had a month free and decided to change the buildings...

Is it just me that's feeling this way?

I'm not really feeling the art for the buildings. I like the idea of upgradeability, but I was expecting it to be more of a size scale rather than a complete art style change. At the moment this looks like a modder had a month free and decided to change the buildings...

Is it just me that's feeling this way?

Nope, not alone.
